#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,i,len;
	char str[101];
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>str;
		len=strlen(str);
		if(len>2)
		{
			for(i=len/2-1;i>=0;i--)
			cout<<str[i];
			for(i=len-1;i>=len/2;i--)
			cout<<str[i];
			cout<<"\n";
		}
		else
		cout<<str<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
